description: This is a CMake script that locates and configures the libcurl library for the build system. It searches for the curl headers and library, and sets up an imported target for use in other parts of the project.

methods.name: find_path
methods.description: Searches for the specified header file 'curl/curl.h' and sets the variable CURL_INCLUDE_DIR if found.

methods.name: find_library
methods.description: Locates the curl library, setting CURL_LIBRARY.

methods.name: include
methods.description: Includes the CMake module 'FindPackageHandleStandardArgs' to assist in checking for package presence.

methods.name: find_package_handle_standard_args
methods.description: Checks if the required variables CURL_LIBRARY and CURL_INCLUDE_DIR are set, indicating the package was found.

methods.name: mark_as_advanced
methods.description: Marks specified variables as advanced, affecting their visibility in GUIs.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets variable values, such as CURL_LIBRARIES and CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Defines an imported target CURL::libcurl using the located library.

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Configures properties for the imported target, such as location and include directories.
